n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

max_rest = 0
rest = 0
for i in a:
    if i == 0:
        max_rest = max(max_rest, rest)
        rest = 0
    else:
        rest += 1

max_rest = max(max_rest, rest)
print(max_rest)
n = int(input())
a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]


# Find the first 0 in a
i = 0
while i < n and a[i] == 1:
    i += 1

# Add the rest of the 1s
max_length = sum(a[:i])

# Find the maximal length of 1s in a
length = 0
for j in range(i, n - 1):
    if a[j] == 0:
        max_length = max(max_length, length)
        length = 0
    else:
        length += 1
    else:
        max_length = max(max_length, length)
        length = 0
max_length = max(max_length, length)

# Add the rest of the 1s
max_length += sum(a[:i])

print(max_length)

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Find the first 0
i = 0
while a[i] == 1:
    i += 1

# Find the maximal length of 1s
max_length = 0
length = 0
for j in range(i, n):
    if a[j] == 1:
        length += 1
    else:
        max_length = max(max_length, length)
        length = 0
max_length = max(max_length, length)

# Add the rest of the 1s
max_length += sum(a[:i])

print(max_length)

max_rest = max(max_rest, rest)
